description: Enable AI Clients to interact with the Directus API through a standardized protocol. Simplify data management and enhance your applications by leveraging the capabilities of Directus with AI integration.

directusUrl.description: URL to your Directus instance. Example: https://your-directus-instance.com

directusEmail.description: Directus user email for authentication. Optional if using access token.

directusPassword.description: Directus user password for authentication. Optional if using access token.

directusAccessToken.description: Directus access token for authentication. Optional if using email/password.

capabilities.name: getItems
capabilities.description: Get items from a collection in Directus

capabilities.name: getItem
capabilities.description: Get a single item from a collection by ID

capabilities.name: createItem
capabilities.description: Create a new item in a collection

capabilities.name: updateItem
capabilities.description: Update an existing item in a collection

capabilities.name: deleteItem
capabilities.description: Delete an item from a collection

capabilities.name: getCollections
capabilities.description: Get all collection schemas from Directus

capabilities.name: login
capabilities.description: Login to Directus and get an access token
